items.title: Congress fires fresh salvo against Sebi Chairperson Madhabi Puri Buch
items.description: Fresh allegation that Buch traded in listed securities while holding a position in Sebi came a day after a detailed response from the Sebi chief and her husband

items.title: Sebi exempts SHPL from making open offer for SpiceJet shareholders
items.description: On conversion of warrants that were issued to it, Spice Healthcare, a promoter group entity, would be acquiring an additional 13,14,08,514 equity shares in the airline
